Setup a Micro Frontend Architecture With Vue and single-spa by @mstrlaw at #ITNEXT. 

#Vuejs #MicroFrontends #WebDevelopment #SoftwareDevelopment #Development

https://t.co/Vi0xTKTl5I
Added some voiceover to my slides... very quick story to illustrate what are #microfrontends and why they are a bad idea (if you are part of a small team!) https://t.co/I6OVWIwvTY

But first... What are #microfrontends

A quick look at the evolution of front-end development. What are micro frontends, its advantages and trade-offs and why it is a pattern worth considering when your application starts to scale...

https://t.co/I6OVWIwvTY

24.09.2020 : #MicroFrontends für #Microservices in der LJUG

Zusammen mit @marius_987 und  @tvdtkb lernen wir unter anderem wie die  Microservices Vorteile die in der Backend-Entwicklung entstehen auch im Frontend genutzt werden können.

https://t.co/GmYx7ATE5b

We are hosting a webinar, with collaboration with Sencha on ‘Building Micro-Frontends using Ext JS’. Register now >>> https://t.co/Vvp1HJvdFD 

#sencha #extjs #ext #microfrontends #applicationdevelopment #technology #mobileapps #webapps #webinar

I am seeing many more Micro Frontends in web development this year.
It is interesting to see how large platforms are moving in this direction (and how far behind I am on frontend technologies now)
https://t.co/nQQ0QJzeGa
